definition: Takahashi (name)/Takahashi city in Okayama prefecture, Japan/Highbridge (name)
Takahashi city in Okayama prefecture 岡山縣|冈山县[Gang1 shan1 xian4], Japan
Takahashigawa, river in Okayama prefecture 岡山縣|冈山县[Gang1 shan1 xian4], Japan

sentences.english: He knows exactly what he's looking for: It's a mutation that already exists in corn and sorghum.
sentences.chinese: 这种突变基因早已在玉米和高梁里存在了。

sentences.english: If It requires chemical signals from sorghum seeds to grow.
sentences.chinese: 它需要从高梁种子中得到生长的化学信号。

sentences.english: Head smut fungus from corn did not infect sorghum.
sentences.chinese: 玉米丝黑穗病菌不能侵染高梁。

sentences.english: This study employed sorghum grain as raw material for ethanol production using an commercial active dry yeast.
sentences.chinese: 本实验以高梁谷粒为原料，进行酒精发酵的研究。

sentences.english: Every year it causes six to seven billion dollars in damage to African green grain Sorghum .
sentences.chinese: 每年，它会引起非洲高梁作物六亿到七亿的损失。

definition: variant of 包穀|包谷[bao1 gu3]
highland barley (grown in Tibet and Qinghai)/qingke barley
(dialect) maize/corn/also written 苞穀|苞谷[bao1 gu3]
broad bean (Vicia faba)/fava bean/also written 蠶豆|蚕豆[can2 dou4]
husk/(of a radish etc) spongy (and therefore unappetising)
grain crops other than rice and wheat
